無法載入媒體。
                



I’m 5’5” 155lbs and this has a loose breezy fit. I have a big chest and this fits me well. I’ve worn it open and buttoned up. The fabric feels soft and good. I also ordered this in the mushroom print and *returned it*. The orange cheetah print is great and feels good. The mushroom print fabric feels cheap and is see-through. So go with the cheetah print when you are making your selection.

商品名稱: SweatyRocks 女款短袖可愛印花鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: Beige Animal
留言內容: I ordered the "Beige Animal" color. For size reference I wear 12/14 (38C - broad shoulders) in tops and the large fits me very well.  The shirt is very light weight, and might be a tad see through in the right light. It is a shorter style, so hits about mid hip. The fabric feels a bit flimsy, although it is soft and comfortable to wear. I have not washed it yet, and I am a little concerned how well it will hold up. Other SweatyRocks shirts with similar material I have seem to shrink a bit after a few washings, so fingers crossed.  I will hand wash this one and will update this review if there are concerns. Overall it is a very cute shirt, that can be worn over a coordinated tee, or alone. Easy to dress up with the right accessories, or worn with jeans or shorts for a casual look.  It should work great as a cool summer top. Taking off one star only because of the laundry concerns.

商品名稱: SweatyRocks 女款短袖可愛印花鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: Graphic Black
留言內容: It's not too short in the front to tuck in if you want that option and it appears to be made with quality material and looks the same after a good amount of washings. I get so many compliments wearing this and it's comfortable and breathable. Love the print. It was one of my birthday presents to me and I would buy others because it's comfy and works in a lot of settings for those who wear many hats

商品名稱: SweatyRocks 女款短袖可愛印花鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: Purple Tree
留言內容: I should have studied the photo more, but this shirt has a lot of good reviews, so I went for it. I bought the pink/blue shirt with the palm trees and it looks great, but the material is very floppy and silky. The design looks almost printed on - it's vibrant and looks nice, but there's nothing underneath, not even at the top like a lot of normal button down shirts, so it's quite easy to see the blank white opposite side of the fabric. Also, just the stitching on the sleeves come over the shoulder, so the sleeves stop at the elbows. I could see that in the photo, but I thought I'd be able to roll them up (I like a shorter short sleeve), but with this fabric it's not possible.I'm only wearing this for one event, though I was hoping it would work enough for me to wear regularly. But it makes me feel bigger and sloppy, so I'm not sure I'll keep it.

商品名稱: SweatyRocks 女款短袖可愛印花鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Medium顏色: Tropical White
留言內容: I order 2 shirts, “Tropical White” and This one, “Beige Leaf”.  Just know each design is DIFFERENT- they’re not the same fabrics or quality!!This shirt - “Beige Leaf” - has nice fabric - 100% viscose.  If you want more of a 100% cotton feel this isn’t it, this is softer and & more flowy. I got the size medium - I have a 37” bust, 28” waist, &  5’6” tall, 127 lbs. It’s loose, but I like it. It’s not long & not shaped, but I tied it where the last 2 button holes are in the photo. I give THIS shirt a 5 star rating.Now the “Tropical White” print one I bought was returned. Think of a dollar store shower curtain…. The fabric was like that. It was 100% polyester. You could probably get that other shirt for $5 on TEMU The “Tropical White” shirt was very disappointing.

商品名稱: SweatyRocks 女款短袖可愛印花鈕扣襯衫上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: Butterfly Beige
留言內容: I am 5'3" and 135 lbs. I usually don't get button ups unless they are men's Hawaiian shirts because those fit me better. I have a larger chest so the space in men's shirts for the shoulder works better for me than in women's shirts. Usually, wear a medium t-shirt and size up to an L in women's button-downs.I ordered a small in this shirt, and it fits me just like the model: same length, sleeve length, and light looseness. If you're tall the length shouldn't be an issue, its longer than most women's shirts since its designed to fit loosely.It covers my chest with not gaping at the buttons at all and without being baggy! the way it fits is great and exactly as expected if you trust the photos. I don't love the material as it's a bit sheer but only enough to sort of see the shadow from a black bra under the tan shirt with butterflies. It's not a particularly soft material but it's polyester so I wasn't expecting it to be. It does crease very easily though, and definitely will need some help getting wrinkles out before wearing it.I'll definitely wear it a few times, but it's not going in the once-a-week set until I get used to the material and figure out how to keep creases out with minimal effort (I'm lazy and don't like ironing).Overall, good and just what you would expect from the advertisement if you take the information at its word (I'm a pessimist and assume everything will be worse than it's supposed to be so I was pleasantly surprised hah).
